articles.description: Do you eat leftover rice thinking it is disease-free? Read on to learn how to safely store leftover rice for consumption.
articles.content: Bacteria can grow very quickly if the rice has remained in temperatures between 40 degrees to 140 degrees Fahrenheit (4 degrees to 60 degrees Celsius) for over two hours. So, you should not be leavin… [+562 chars]
